mapper.select: SELECT c.t_company_name, e.t_employee_auth, e.t_employee_duty FROM t_user u JOIN t_employee e ON u.t_user_no = e.t_user_no JOIN t_company c ON e.t_company_no = c.t_company_no WHERE u.t_user_id = #{userId};

SELECT s.t_service_name, s.t_service_menu_icon_path FROM t_user u JOIN t_service_published sp ON u.t_user_no = sp.t_user_no JOIN t_service s ON sp.t_service_no = s.t_service_no WHERE u.t_user_id = #{userId};
